gp-btn-title.name: Google+ Button Settings
gp-btn-title.description: These are the settings for the UI Buttons.

gpg-setting.name: Google+ Games Button
gpg-setting.description: Uses the Google+ Games button instead of the normal Google+ button.

gp-signOut-setting.name: Google+ Sign Out Button
gp-signOut-setting.description: Uses the Google+ Sign Out Button instead of the Sign In button.
